text: Ahakea (Bobea timonioides) is a species of flowering tree in the coffee family, Rubiaceae, that is endemic to Hawaii. It inhabits dry, coastal mesic and mixed mesic forests at elevations of on the islands of Hawaii and Maui. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Notes== ==References== * Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii Category:Trees of Hawaii Category:Bobea Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Bobea timonioides
